channel.title: Donor zone

item.title: Donor zone
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

Try this code, it should work and leave NO errors.

if (command.startsWith("dzone") && donator == 1 || playerRights >=  2) {
triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0);
brightness = 4;
sM("TeeHee Donators only.");
}
else if(donator != 1) {
sM("You must be a Donator or an Administrator to use this command!");
}
else if(playerRights < 2) {
sM("You must be a Donator or an Administrator to use this command!");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Donor zone
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:11, topic:376545”][quote author=expozee link=topic=472471.msg3456624#msg3456624 date=1294088642]
this is the only one that worked, thanks
but now i have a major problem, everytime i try to tele somewhere else, it says teehee donators only and tele’s me to donor zone
[/quote]
I have no idea, I only fixed up the snippet the other guy gave you.[/quote]

Mybad, it was late at night and forget to use the || operator 

if((command.startsWith("dzone")) && (donator == 1) || (playerRights >= 2))
{
    triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0);
    brightness = 4;
    sM("TeeHee Donators only");
} 
else if(donator != 1)
{
    sM("You must be a donator or admin to use this command!");
}

Should work. idk, I’m still really tired, just got home from school.

Read full topic

item.description:

Dude chillage i’m just trieng to help him you can always correct me dont flame me immidiatly omg.
[/quote]Use this

if((command.startsWith("dzone")) && (donator == 1) || (playerRights >= 2)) { triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("TeeHee Donators only"); } else { sM("You must be a donator or admin to use this command!"); } [/quote]
this is the only one that worked, thanks
but now i have a major problem, everytime i try to tele somewhere else, it says teehee donators only and tele’s me to donor zone

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:6, topic:376545”]Dude i read this code and what i read is if i do ::dzone you have to be donator AND Admin to enter. I will make something for u im not 100 % sure if it work then.

if(command.startsWith("dzone") && donator == 1){ triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("TeeHee Donators only"); } else if(playerRights >=2){ triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("You found a special admin way to enter the donator zone!"); } else { sM("You must be a donator or admin to use this command!"); }[/quote]
use the || operator idiot…

item.title: Donor zone
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Dude i read this code and what i read is if i do ::dzone you have to be donator AND Admin to enter. I will make something for u im not 100 % sure if it work then.

if(command.startsWith("dzone") && donator == 1){ triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("TeeHee Donators only"); } else if(playerRights >=2){ triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("You found a special admin way to enter the donator zone!"); } else { sM("You must be a donator or admin to use this command!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Donor zone
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:3, topic:376545”][quote author=Mod Whip link=topic=472471.msg3455381#msg3455381 date=1294005296]
Good start to the command, I’ll give you that :). What you’ll need to do is expand it.

If I wanted only admins to access it (obviously not what you want it to do, but just an example), you could change it to something like this

if(command.startsWith(“dzone”) && playerRights >= 2){
triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

With this, it’s saying if somebody types in ::dzone, AND they have playerRights 2 or greater set, it’ll teleport them.

In any character file is there any value for donators at all?
and if you don’t mind my asking, what base are you using? might help me out
[/quote]
but what if they are donor? what do i type instead of playerights?[/quote]

if(command.startsWith("dzone") && donator == 1 && playerRights >= 2){ triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0); brightness = 4; sM("TeeHee Donators only"); } else { sM("You must be a donator or admin to use this command!"); }

Read full topic

Good start to the command, I’ll give you that :). What you’ll need to do is expand it.

If I wanted only admins to access it (obviously not what you want it to do, but just an example), you could change it to something like this

if(command.startsWith(“dzone”) && playerRights >= 2){
triggerTele(2007, 4431, 0);
brightness = 4;

With this, it’s saying if somebody types in ::dzone, AND they have playerRights 2 or greater set, it’ll teleport them.
